task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 341°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, so I will tilt my view upwards to see the roof.
I can now see the top and bottom of the building, and I estimate it has about 14 floors; assuming a standard floor height of 3.5 meters, the total height is approximately 49 meters.
